title: Google Pixel 6 and Pixel 6 Pro pick up official certification for Verizon’s faster C-Band 5G
content:
According to Verizon, Google’s Pixel 6 and Pixel 6 Pro are picking up official support for the carrier’s C-Band 5G this week with a new update rolling out now.

more…

The post Google Pixel 6 and Pixel 6 Pro pick up official certification for Verizon’s faster C-Band 5G appeared first on 9to5Google.
description: A couple of months behind others, Google's Pixel 6 and Pixel 6 Pro have been certified for Verizon C-Band 5G support.
